topic.shortdesc: Rampia and Prince Charming find happiness.

image.alt: Image of the wedding from Tangled.

body.p: When Rampia's parents opened the door, they knew instantly who she was, and were overjoyed to see their daughter. Her mother pulled her into a tight embrace, and her father brushed away a tear. They had been very worried while she was missing, and had searched every town nearby for any sign of her. They were quite old now, and had had no hope of ever seeing their daughter again.

Rampia introduced her parents to Prince Charming, and to their twins. Her parents were shocked to learn that they had grandchildren, but they pulled the babies into their arms as well and were overcome with love.

Prince Charming then took Rampia and her parents with him to his palace, where the king and queen gave them a royal welcome. They greeted Rampia as if they had known her for her whole life. Soon after, Rampia and the prince were wed in their gleaming castle, and Rampia was crowned as princess.
They lived together in the castle, and their children were raised as prince and princess. After a few years, they became king and queen, and ruled their land with grace and honor.
And they all lived happily, to the end of their days.
